resources.string: Open Dash Cam is your\n eyewitness on the road.
While navigating with Google Maps or any other application in the background, Open Dash Cam will record what happens on the road using your phone camera.

When you start the app, the red \"REC\" widget will appear, indicating that video recording has started.\n\n Google Maps will start in the background, so you can navigate while the dash cam is recording.
\"View recordings\" will show all videos recorded
Use \"Save recording\" if you captured an important moment
Current recording marked as starred. Starred recordings will not be deleted.
Some devices record videos in the flipped mode. If that is the case, enable this setting
Puts your phone in silent mode while running to disable camera sound when recording starts and stops
Start Google Maps navigation when you start the app
Includes audio in the video recordings
Delete all recordings created by Open Dash Cam
New videos get recorded continuously every 45 seconds, so you should see one here soon.
